actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Energy and Government Processes.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy, Nuclear Proliferation and Government Processes

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for grants to State and local governments to assist in eliminating census undercounts, and for other purposes.
short_title: Census Awareness and Accountability Act of 1985

summary.text: Census Awareness and Accountability Act of 1985 - Requires the Secretary of Commerce with respect to each decennial and mid-decade census to submit to the appropriate congressional committees, not later than 18 months before the appropriate census date, a report containing the procedures for estimating and adjusting any overcount or undercount in any tabulation of total population. Establishes a program to provide grants to States and local governments to promote activities designed to minimize the extent of any undercounts which may occur in the decennial census. Authorizes amounts to be appropriated for FY 1986 through 1990 for such grants.

titles.title: Census Awareness and Accountability Act of 1985
A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for grants to State and local governments to assist in eliminating census undercounts, and for other purposes.
